name: Dream Sweet in Sea Major
description:
Reminiscing on both an old dream and a beloved song.

Written for TwinyJam.

Mirrored in browser on Philome.la.

Additional Note: This is the first time I've even remotely messed with coding, so there's barely (if any) bells and whistles on this thing. One day I'll make a better version of this. One day.....

Update (5/14/2015) - Now playable in-browser, exciting!
